author: mank319
name: Faience+Mint
description:
Credits
This theme is based on the Cinnamon theme "Faience+" by bimsebasse
which is a port of the original "Faience" Gnome Shell theme by tiheum.
All credits go to these authors for their work!

Features
I have modified the theme to match Linux Mint's green color scheme
instead of Faience's blue tone.

Contribute
It may not be complete as I have yet to work through all of the theme's css, but for my particular setup I have not recognized missing parts so far.
If you find something that does not fit in well don't mind telling me or contributing to the theme directly on Github :-)
